title: Bissell® Featherweight™ PowerBrush Vacuum, 2773A
description: BISSELL® Featherweight™ PowerBrush is a 3-in-1 ultra-lightweight corded stick vacuum that’s great for quick and effective multi-surface cleaning. With its powerful motorized brush roll, Featherweight™ PowerBrush can be used as a lightweight stick vacuum for speedy cleaning across multiple surfaces, including carpet, area rugs and hard floors. Use the Quick Release Handle to easily convert the machine into a hand vacuum for cleaning above floor surfaces with the crevice tool, or keep the foot on the hand vacuum for cleaning stairs. This ultra-lightweight machine weighs less than 4 lbs, making it is easy to use and light enough to carry around your home. Plus, it easily stores when you’re done cleaning. BISSELL proudly supports BISSELL Pet Foundation® and its mission to help save homeless pets. When you buy a BISSELL product, you help save pets, too. We’re proud to design products that help make pet messes, odors and pet homelessness disappear.
